name: Field
description: Form field container with automatic ARIA attribute composition for labels, descriptions, and error messages

accessibility.screenReader: Composes ARIA attributes for form controls. Labels, descriptions, and errors are linked via aria-labelledby and aria-describedby.

recommendedUsage: Wrap form controls (input, textarea, checkbox, etc.) with ds-field to provide accessible labels and validation messages.
antiPatterns: Do not nest ds-field components. Do not use ds-field for non-form content like headings.
